TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SiteMapPath extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl

summary.span: 顯示一組文字或影像超連結，讓使用者可以更輕鬆地巡覽網站，而且需要最少的分頁空間數。

span.span: Displays a set of text or image hyperlinks that enable users to more easily navigate a Web site, while taking a minimal amount of page space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [節點Nodes](#nodes) - [節點的外觀Node Appearance](#node_appearance) - [事件Events](#events) - [自訂 SiteMapPath 控制項Customizing the SiteMapPath Control](#customizing_the_sitemappath_control) - [協助工具選項Accessibility](#accessibility) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 控制項是站台瀏覽控制項，以反映所提供的資料物件。The control is a site navigation control that reflects data provided by the object. 它提供節省空間的方式，輕鬆地瀏覽的網站，並做為參考目前顯示的網頁所在站台內的點。It provides a space-saving way to easily navigate a site and serves as a point of reference for where the currently displayed page is within a site. 這種類型的控制項通常稱為階層連結或置頂，因為它會顯示提供的逸出的頁面階層中往上從目前位置的階層式路徑超連結的頁面名稱。This type of control is commonly called a breadcrumb, or eyebrow, because it displays a hierarchical path of hyperlinked page names that provides an escape up the hierarchy of pages from the current location. 。. 適用於站台具有深度階層式頁面結構，但或可能需要在頁面上的太多空間。The is useful for sites that have deep hierarchical page structures, but where a or might require too much space on a page. 控制項適用於直接與您的網站的站台對應資料。The control works directly with your Web site's site map data. 如果您在使用它在頁面上，不會呈現您的站台對應，它將不會顯示。If you use it on a page that is not represented in your site map, it will not be displayed. 如需站台對應的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 網站巡覽](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/23de8a05-cac3-4693-b508-39f1d4b7053d)。For more information about site maps, see [ASP.NET Site Navigation](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/23de8a05-cac3-4693-b508-39f1d4b7053d). ## 節點Nodes 所組成的節點。The is made up of nodes. 在路徑中的每個項目稱為一個節點，而由物件。Each element in the path is called a node and is represented by a object. 錨定路徑，並代表階層樹狀結構的基底的節點稱為根節點。The node that anchors the path and represents the base of the hierarchical tree is called the root node. 代表目前顯示的頁面節點是目前的節點。The node that represents the currently displayed page is the current node. 目前節點和根節點之間的任何其他節點會是父節點。Any other node between the current node and root node is a parent node. 下表描述三種不同的節點類型。The following table describes the three different node types. |節點類型Node type|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |根root|節點的錨定的一組階層式節點。A node that anchors a hierarchical set of nodes.| |父代parent|有一個或多個子節點，但不是目前節點的節點。A node that has one or more child nodes, but is not the current node.| |目前的current|表示在目前顯示的頁面節點。A node that represents the currently displayed page.| ## 節點的外觀Node Appearance 顯示每個節點是或您可以套用範本或樣式至控制項。Each node displayed by a is a or control that you can apply a template or style to. 範本和樣式套用至節點，根據兩個規則的優先順序：The templates and styles are applied to nodes according to two rules of precedence: - 如果節點定義範本，它會覆寫為節點所定義的所有樣式。If a template is defined for a node, it overrides any style defined for the node. - 範本與特定類型的節點的樣式會覆寫一般範本和樣式定義的所有節點。Templates and styles that are specific to types of nodes override general templates and styles defined for all nodes. 和屬性會套用到所有節點，不論其節點型別。The and properties are applied to all nodes, regardless of their node type. 如果這些屬性定義，優先。If both these properties are defined, the takes precedence. 和屬性會套用到代表目前顯示的頁面節點。The and properties are applied to nodes that represent the currently displayed page. 如果定義除了，則會忽略它。If a is defined in addition to the , it is ignored. 如果定義除了，與合併建立合併的樣式。If a is defined in addition to the , it is merged with the to create a merged style. 這個合併的樣式會使用的所有項目，再加上的任何其他項目，不會衝突。This merged style uses all the elements of the , plus any additional elements of the that do not conflict with the . 和屬性會套用到代表站台瀏覽階層的根節點。The and properties are applied to the node that represents the root of the site navigation hierarchy. 如果定義除了，則會忽略它。If a is defined in addition to the , it is ignored. 如果定義除了，與合併建立合併的樣式。If a is defined in addition to the , it is merged with the to create a merged style. 這個合併的樣式會使用的所有項目，再加上的任何其他項目未不衝突的。This merged style uses all the elements of the , plus any additional elements of the that did not conflict with the . 最後，如果在目前顯示的頁面是根頁面的 站台，和而不是使用或。Finally, if the currently displayed page is the root page of the site, the and are used instead of the or . 控制項使用所識別的站台對應提供者當成資料來源的站台瀏覽資訊的屬性。The control uses the site map provider identified by the property as its data source for site navigation information. 如果未不指定任何提供者，它會使用預設提供者站台中識別屬性。If no provider is specified, it uses the default provider for the site, identified in the property. 一般而言，這是 ASP.NET 的預設站台對應提供者的執行個體。Typically, this is an instance of the default site map provider for ASP.NET, the . 如果控制項用在站台內，但沒有站台對應提供者已設定，控制項就會擲回例外狀況。If the control is used within a site but no site map provider is configured, the control throws an exception. ## 事件Events 控制項也提供您可以程式設計的事件。The control also provides events that you can program against. 這可讓您在事件發生時執行自訂的常式。This allows you to run a custom routine whenever an event occurs. 下表列出支援的事件控制項。The following table lists the events supported by the control. |Event - 事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||發生時控制項會先建立並將它與相關聯。Occurs when the control first creates a and associates it with a .| ||發生時繫結至網站所包含的地圖資料。Occurs when a is bound to site map data contained by the .| ## 自訂 SiteMapPath 控制項Customizing the SiteMapPath Control 類別衍生自覆寫方法，以自訂導覽控制項所包含的控制項。Classes that derive from override the method to customize the controls contained by the navigation control. 完整控制的方式如物件會建立並新增到、 衍生類別覆寫方法。For complete control over the way objects are created and added to the , derived classes override the method. ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合網頁可及性標準標記資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用以宣告方式在 Web Form 網頁的控制項。The following code example uses a control declaratively in a Web Forms page. 這個範例示範一些控管與範本和樣式套用到順序的優先順序規則節點。This example demonstrates some of the rules of precedence that govern the order with which templates and styles are applied to nodes. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_5#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_5/CS/webform2navpathcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_5#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_5/VB/webform2navpathvb.aspx#1)] 先前的範例會使用預設站台地圖提供者和 Web.sitemap 檔案具有下列結構。The previous example uses the default site map provider and a Web.sitemap file with the following structure. ``` ``` 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充控制，並將加入其中的新功能，藉由覆寫方法。The following code example demonstrates extends the control and adds new functionality to it by overriding the method. `DropDownSiteMapPath`控制項會將之後的目前的節點，即可輕鬆瀏覽至子節點的目前頁面的頁面。The `DropDownSiteMapPath` control adds a after the current node, to enable easy navigation to pages that are child nodes of the current page. 此範例示範如何使用物件，包括檢查其，然後呼叫方法之後建立的項目。This example demonstrates how to work with objects, including checking their and calling the method after the items are created. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.DropDownNavigationPath_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.DropDownNavigationPath_1/CS/dropdownnavigationpath.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.DropDownNavigationPath_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.DropDownNavigationPath_1/VB/dropdownnavigationpath.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 若要以動態方式加入控制項的頁面，建立新物件、 設定其屬性，並再將它加入這類容器控制項的集合。To dynamically add a control to a page, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the collection of a container control such as . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建構函式來加入網頁的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to add a control to a page. 如範例能夠運作，您需要將影像加入至您的根目錄，並變更影像檔的名稱從"myimage.jpg 」 的範例程式碼中的影像名稱。For the example to work, you need to add an image to your root directory and change the image name in the example code from "myimage.jpg" to the name of your image file. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_3/CS/aboutus2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_3/VB/aboutus2vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會呼叫這個方法由 ASP.NET 基礎結構，以通知使用組合為基礎的實作，包括衍生自控制項的任何控制項和來建立任何子系所包含的控制項，以準備回傳或轉譯。This method is called by the ASP.NET infrastructure to notify any controls that use composition-based implementation, including controls that derive from and to create any child controls they contain in preparation for postback or rendering.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會建立控制，將其與對應相關聯物件從目前的站台對應提供者，並新增至節點集合。The method creates controls, associates them with the corresponding objects from the current site map provider, and adds the nodes to the collection. 方法會先尋找，再一一查核的階層式樹狀結構向上物件，建立直到每個為止。The method begins by finding the , and then walks up the hierarchical tree of objects, creating a for each one until the is reached. 個之後建立時之前它已繫結至其相對應,，但、方法呼叫。After each is created, but before it is bound to its corresponding , the method is called. 方法適用於任何範本或樣式為特定節點型別定義和建立並初始化任何子控制項的包含。The method applies any templates or styles defined for a particular node type and creates and initializes any child controls that the contains. 最後，方法會將子控制項的至集合。Finally, the method adds the child controls of the to the collection. 在每個之後初始化時，方法呼叫。After each is initialized, the method is called. 然後在繫結至其相對應，和呼叫。Then the is bound to its corresponding , and is called. 方法從呼叫方法。The method is called from the method. 擴充的類別控制覆寫方法以改變如何建立或加入至控制項控制項。Classes that extend the control override the method to alter how the controls are created or added to the control. 會在中執行的個別節點的項目操作方法，以及大部分的類別擴充覆寫這個方法只。The manipulation of individual node items is performed in the method, and most classes that extend override that method only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制表示目前所顯示的頁面導覽路徑節點的顯示文字的外觀。Use the property to control the appearance of the display text for the navigation path node that represents the currently displayed page. 根據預設，顯示的文字是指定屬性所代表的頁面。By default, the display text is that specified in the property of the that represents the page. 一般樣式設定包含自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩、 字型屬性和節點間距。Common style settings include custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing. 如樣式屬性的節點會合併成單一的樣式，順序如下：For nodes, style properties are merged into a single style, in the following order: 1. 2. 或者，如果在目前顯示的頁面是根節點，則。 or, if the currently displayed page is the root node, . > [!NOTE] > 除非明確設定為，如果您刪除線或頂線的樣式設定節點的字型樣式，不顯示節點的預設底線樣式`true`。If you set the node font style to a strikeout or overline style, the default underline style of the node is not displayed unless it is explicitly set to `true`. 如果屬性定義，屬性會被忽略。If a property is defined, the property is ignored. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式設定的Web Form 頁面中的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the of a control in a Web Forms page. remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定至物件以使用控制項或其他控制項，例如，做為目前節點的使用者介面項目，而非字串。Set the to an object to use an control or some other control, such as a , as the current node's user interface element instead of a string. 如果屬性設定時，範本會覆寫目前的瀏覽節點文字顯示，以及任何套用到它。If the property is set, the template overrides both the current navigation node text displayed and any applied to it. 如果目前顯示的頁面對應於根節點，不過，或用。If the currently displayed page corresponds to the root node, however, the or is used. 您可以宣告一組屬性設為任何 Web 伺服器控制項，並在 ASP.NET 基礎結構會執行必要的步驟，將 Web 伺服器控制項，做為物件。You can declaratively set the property to any Web server control, and the ASP.NET infrastructure performs the necessary steps to wrap the Web server control as an object. 不過，Web 伺服器控制項不會實作介面; 因此，當您使用屬性以程式設計的方式，您必須撰寫範本中的任何程式碼包裝函式。However, Web server controls do not implement the interface; therefore, when you work with the properties programmatically, you must write an wrapper for any template code. 然後，屬性設定為執行個體包裝函式。Then, the property is set to an instance of the wrapper. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會以宣告方式定義和覆寫定義。The following code example declaratively defines a and overrides a defined . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_5#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_5/CS/webform2navpathcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_5#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_5/VB/webform2navpathvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會判斷項目代表藉由檢查節點的功能類型，並套用任何範本或定義為該類型節點的樣式。The method determines the functional type of node that the item represents by checking the , and applies any templates or styles that are defined for that kind of node. 如果具有項目類型，建立子控制項，而和可能會套用。If the has a item type, a child control is created, and the and may be applied. 如果設定，其套用至節點。If the is set, its is applied to the node. 中改用已經設定，與任何定義合併並套用。In instead the is set, it is merged with any defined and applied. 最後，如果沒有定義任何範本或樣式，基本控制建立和初始化使用中節點的值。Finally, if no templates or styles are defined, a basic control is created and initialized with values from the node. 如果具有項目類型，可能是或建立子控制項時，根據傳回值。If the has a item type, either a or child control is created, depending on the return value of . 然後任一或可能會套用。Then either the or may be applied. 如果設定，其套用至節點。If the is set, its is applied to the node. 如果改用已經設定，與任何定義合併並套用。If instead the is set, it is merged with any defined and applied. 如果具有項目類型，建立子控制項和和可能會套用。If the has a item type, a child control is created and the and may be applied. 如果設定，其套用至節點。If the is set, its is applied to the node. 如果改用已經設定，它會套用。If instead the is set, it is applied. 最後，如果具有項目類型，建立子控制項和和會根據針對定義相同的一般規則套用節點型別。Finally, if the has a item type, a child control is created and the and are applied according to the same general rules defined for a node type. 覆寫方法來操作個別物件。Override the method to manipulate individual objects. 如果類別的設計需要更多控制方式物件會建立並新增到控制，請覆寫方法。If the design of the class requires more extensive control over how the objects are created and added to the control, override the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法，將功能加入至控制項衍生自。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to add functionality to a control that derives from . 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 取得用於網站巡覽路徑中所有節點顯示文字的樣式。

span.span: Gets the style used for the display text for all nodes in the site navigation path.

value.span: 含有用於在 控制項中顯示文字的樣式設定。

span.span: The that contains the style settings for the display text in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制控制項所呈現的所有導覽路徑節點的顯示文字的外觀。Use the property to control the appearance of the display text for all navigation path nodes rendered by the control. 根據預設，顯示的文字是指定屬性所代表的頁面。By default, the display text is that specified in the property of the that represents the page. 一般樣式設定包含自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩、 字型屬性和節點間距。Common style settings include custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing. 如樣式屬性的節點會合併成單一的樣式，順序如下：For nodes, style properties are merged into a single style, in the following order: 1. 2. 或，取決於節點類型。 or , depending on the node type. > [!NOTE] > 除非明確設定為，如果您刪除線或頂線的樣式設定節點的字型樣式，不顯示節點的預設底線樣式`true`。If you set the node font style to a strikeout or overline style, the default underline style of the node is not displayed unless it is explicitly set to `true`. 如果是定義，它一開始會套用到每個節點。If the is defined, it is initially applied to each node. 如果其他的樣式定義的特定類型的節點，例如根節點或目前的節點，此樣式會取代中指定的一般樣式屬性。If an additional style is defined for a particular type of node, such as the root node or current node, this style supersedes the general style specified in the property. 如果範本會定義特定類型的節點，它會取代該節點的所有已定義的樣式。If a template is defined for a particular type of node, it supersedes all defined styles for that node. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何定義與合併示範的樣式優先順序節點。The following code example demonstrates how to define a that is merged with a to demonstrate the order of style precedence for the nodes. summary.span: 取得或設定控制項樣板以供網站巡覽路徑的所有功能節點使用。

span.span: Gets or sets a control template to use for all functional nodes of a site navigation path.

value.span: 實作 方法的 物件，以便呈現巡覽路徑每個節點的自訂內容。

span.span: An object that implements the method, to render custom content for each node of a navigation path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定至物件以使用或其他一些控制項，例如，為所有導覽路徑節點的使用者介面項目。Set the to an object to use an or some other control, such as a , as a user interface element for all navigation path nodes. 如果屬性設定時，範本會覆寫，顯示在瀏覽節點文字和任何套用到它。If the property is set, the template overrides both the navigation node text displayed and any applied to it. 在目前和根節點，如果或已經設定，這些範本會覆寫。For the current and root nodes, if a or is set, these templates override the . 您可以宣告一組屬性設為任何 Web 伺服器控制項，並在 ASP.NET 基礎結構會執行必要的步驟，將 Web 伺服器控制項，做為物件。You can declaratively set the property to any Web server control, and the ASP.NET infrastructure performs the necessary steps to wrap the Web server control as an object. 不過，Web 伺服器控制項不會實作介面; 因此，當您使用屬性以程式設計的方式，您必須撰寫範本中的任何程式碼包裝函式。However, Web server controls do not implement the interface; therefore, when you work with the properties programmatically, you must write an wrapper for any template code. 然後，屬性設定為執行個體包裝函式。Then, the property is set to an instance of the wrapper. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何，當指定其中一個，則會覆寫樣式定義的所有節點，包括特殊根節點和目前節點的樣式。The following code example demonstrates how a , when one is specified, overrides styles defined for all nodes, including special styles for the root node and current node. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_6#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_6/CS/webform1navpathcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_6#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_6/VB/webform1navpathvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之後引發事件控制項建立，這是 Web 伺服器控制項代表，並將它相關聯。The event is raised after the control creates a , which is a Web server control that represents a , and associates it to a . 方法會建立的節點的項目繫結至其資料之前呼叫。The method is called before the created node item is bound to its data. 這可讓您提供事件處理方法執行自訂的常式，每當建立。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever a is created. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫方法之後建立內方法。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method after creating a within the method. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時控制項繫結至所提供的資料其。The event is raised when the control binds to the data provided by its . 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如更新資料庫或顯示的內容時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as updating a database or the displayed content, whenever this event occurs. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項顯示的父節點層級數目，相對於目前顯示的節點。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of levels of parent nodes the control displays, relative to the currently displayed node.

value.span: 指定顯示父節點層級數目的整數，相對於目前內容節點。

span.span: An integer that specifies the number of levels of parent nodes displayed, relative to the current context node.

value.span: 預設值為 -1，表示對控制項顯示的父層級數目沒有限制。

span.span: The default value is -1, which indicates no restriction on the number of parent levels that the control displays.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可控制多少層的父節點會顯示高於目前的內容節點的控制項。The property governs how many levels of parent nodes are displayed by the control above the current context node. 根據預設，會顯示目前內容節點上方的所有父系及祖系節點。By default, all parent and ancestor nodes above the current context node are displayed. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

span.span: The value for is less than -1.

summary.span: 取得或設定巡覽路徑節點呈現的順序。

span.span: Gets or sets the order that the navigation path nodes are rendered in.

value.span: 表示巡覽節點呈現的階層順序。

span.span: A that indicates the hierarchical order that navigation nodes are rendered in.

value.span: 預設為 ，表示節點呈現的階層順序是從最頂端的節點到目前的節點，並由左至右。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that the nodes are rendered in hierarchical order from the top-most node to the current node, from left to right.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定至如果您想要顯示的導覽路徑從左到右; 瀏覽路徑會顯示進度從左到右的站台對應的節點。Set to if you want to display the navigation path from left to right; the navigation path appears as a progression from left to right of site map nodes. 換句話說，根節點位於最左邊的位置、 每個後續節點處於到右方時下, 一個位置，以及目前節點處於最右邊的位置。In other words, the root node is at the leftmost position, each subsequent node is in the next position to the right, and the current node is in the rightmost position. 設定至如果您想要顯示由右至左的導覽路徑。Set to if you want to display the navigation path from right to left. 換句話說，節點順序會顛倒，因此根節點會顯示在右邊的位置和目前的節點會顯示在左邊的位置。In other words, the node order is reversed so that the root node displays at the rightmost position and the current node displays at the leftmost position. 不是公用，而這種排序可用於當地語系化 Web Form 頁面和控制項由右至左讀取的語言。While not as common, this ordering can be used for localizing Web Forms pages and the control for languages that read from right to left. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式設定屬性Web Form 網頁中。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the property of a in a Web Forms page. remarks.format: ## Remarks 檢視狀態是伺服器控制項的屬性值的累積。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 這些值會自動放入伺服器控制項的屬性，這是執行個體的類別。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 儲存狀態的伺服器控制項的生命週期的階段之後，這個屬性的值然後會保存到字串物件。The value of this property is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle. 這個字串物件儲存檢視狀態時，會為儲存在變數傳回給用戶端`Hidden`HTML 項目。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an `Hidden` HTML element. 當您撰寫自訂的伺服器控制項時，您可以透過覆寫這個方法，並修改您的伺服器控制項來改善效率屬性。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是您可以設定讓網頁更多或更少的螢幕助讀程式的使用者都能存取的屬性。 is a property that you can set to make a Web page more or less accessible to users of screen readers. 包含多個頁面，例如顯示網站導覽資料的控制項的重複內容的網站可以提供一套機制，可讓螢幕助讀員略過重複的內容，以便不大聲閱讀的使用者。Web sites that contain content that repeats on multiple pages, such as controls that display site map data, can provide a mechanism that allows users of screen readers to skip the repeated content so that it is not read aloud. 控制項提供屬性做為螢幕助讀程式所要略過整個控制項的方式。The control provides the property as a way for the entire control to be skipped by screen readers. 如果屬性設定，呈現不可見的影像的替代文字，讓使用者選擇跳到內容的結尾。If the property is set, an invisible image with alternate text is rendered, giving the user the option to jump to the end of the content. 螢幕助讀程式會大聲閱讀的替代文字，但映像不會干擾視覺網頁流程中的。Screen readers read the alternate text aloud but the image does not disturb the visual flow of the page. 屬性設定為 「 略過巡覽連結 」 上，依預設，讓螢幕助讀員略過控制項。The property is set to "Skip Navigation Links" by default, which makes screen readers skip the control. 如果您想要停用此行為，將屬性設定為。If you want to disable this behavior, set the property to . 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
